page.title: 07The Bradford City Disaster.
page.content: On{Saturday May 11th 1985}at aproximately 3.45pm the mainstand at Valley Parade,the home of Bradford City Football Club,caught fire.There were almost 3000 fans in the stand,of which{56 people were killed}and many seriously injured.It is not known how the fire started but it is thought a cigarette fell into the rubbish under the stand and set it alight.Once the fire took hold it soon spread,in four minutes the{whole stand was ablaze.} Most of the dead were killed in the passageway.The fans who were trapped were burned.The emergency services worked very hard trying to save the many fans who were trapped.Many of the rescuers were also burned as they tried to save the casualties.
